segments.text: Hold tight!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 뱃전 꽉 잡아!

segments.text: S
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 에스

segments.text: We have another ten minutes tops before this ship sinks like a stone!
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 이 배가 돌덩이처럼 가라앉기 전까지 기껏해야 10분밖에 안 남았어!

segments.text: … 60% of the left cabin has been flooded, as well as 75% of the right cabin.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 좌측 선실은 60%, 우측 선실은 75%가 물에 잠겼어요.

segments.text: The ship cannot survive such a ferocious storm. Timekeeper, we should get ready for evacuation.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 배가 이런 맹렬한 폭풍을 견딜 수 없어요. 타임키퍼, 철수할 준비를 해야 해요.

segments.text: Hm. Prepare the Teleport soft disk.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 흠, 순간 이동 플로피 디스크를 준비해.

segments.text: Wait, what're you talking about? Are we going to abandon the ship?!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 잠깐만, 무슨 소리를 하는 거야? 배를 버리겠다고?!

segments.text: These are just some breezes and ripples! Won't last longer than a blink of an eye! Just hold on to the wheel, and we'll …
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 이 정도는 그냥 산들바람이랑 물결일 뿐이야! 눈 깜짝할 사이에 지나간다고! 방향타만 꽉 잡고 있으면 우리는...

segments.text: Here comes a big wave.
segments.translation: 그 순간, 파도가 거세게 밀려왔다.

segments.text: Hmm. That sounds like the turbine just cracked.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 음... 터빈에 금이 간 소리 같네요.

segments.text: Great, so only two minutes left.
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 좋아, 그럼 2분밖에 안 남았네.

segments.text: A true captain will never abandon her ship!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 훌륭한 캡틴은 자신의 배를 절대 버리지 않아!

segments.text: I have sworn to live and die with Rockin' APPLe, the second of its name!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 난 APPLe호 로큰롤 2세와 생사를 함께할 거라고!

segments.text: Then why is it the "second"?
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 그럼 왜 두 번째라고 하는 거야?

segments.text: From behind her sunglasses Regulus's gaze drifts into the distance.
segments.translation: 선글라스 너머로 레굴루스의 시선이 먼 곳을 향했다.

segments.text: D
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: D

segments.text: I racked my brains to think of all the assurances I could give to get that governess off my back!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 그 가정교사를 떼어내려고 온갖 보장을 다 해줄 생각으로 머리를 쥐어짰다고!

segments.text: I think it's better for us to embrace the fact that all things would come to an end, Captain.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 모든 것은 결국 끝이 난다는 사실을 받아들이는 게 좋을 것 같습니다, 캡틴.

segments.text: Sometimes, deserting is to leave for another battlefield.
segments.translation: 때로는 다음 전투를 위해 일보 후퇴해야 하는 순간이 있는 법이죠.

segments.text: The rain washes the radio shell. The flower on top, which was once well cared for, now droops with weariness.
segments.translation: 라디오를 때리는 빗물에, 정성스럽게 보살핀 꽃도 고개가 꺾여 버렸다.

segments.text: Regulus stares at that flower blankly. Then, her eyes widen as she suddenly realizes something.
segments.translation: 레굴루스는 그 꽃을 멍하니 바라본다. 그러다 문득 무언가를 깨달은 듯 눈을 크게 뜬다.

segments.text: Oh, you are one to talk about deserting!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 어, 도망치는 얘기는 네가 할 소리가 아니지!

segments.text: If it wasn't for you, we wouldn't have ended up like this in the middle of the ...
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 너만 아니었어도 우리가 이 지경이 되지는...

segments.text: Timekeeper, we have an emergency.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 타임키퍼, 비상사태예요.

segments.text: The Teleport soft disk can't be activated.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 순간 이동 플로피 디스크가 작동하지 않아요.

segments.text: I've tried other contingency teleport incantations, but none of them worked in this area, neither did the communicator.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 다른 긴급 전송 주문도 시도해 봤지만, 이 해역에서는 통하지 않아요. 통신기도 마찬가지고요.

segments.text: It's as if something is jamming the signal.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 뭔가가 신호를 교란하고 있는 것 같아요.

segments.text: I see.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 알겠어.

segments.text: I have a question for you, Sonetto.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 궁금한 게 하나 있는데, 소네트.

segments.text: Please, Timekeeper.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 말씀하세요, 타임키퍼.

segments.text: Hmm.
segments.speaker: Vertin

segments.text: In the Field Mission Evacuation Instructions, apart from the part about "asking the Timekeeper for help" …
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 현장 임무 철수 지침에서 타임키퍼에게 도움을 요청하라는 부분을 제외하면...

segments.text: Is there anyone else we can reach out to for rescue?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 구조를 요청할 수 있는 다른 사람이 또 있을까?

segments.text: Er, seriously, Vertin?
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 어, 진짜야, 버틴?

segments.text: Hahahaha!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 하하하!

segments.text: Without hesitation, Regulus pounces on Ms. Radio immediately.
segments.translation: 레굴루스는 주저 없이 당장 라디오 아가씨에게 달려든다.

segments.text: I see what's going on now. This is a trap!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 이제 알겠다, 이 모든 건 함정이었어!

segments.text: And you are behind all these! It is you who played that nonsense travel note from 1999 ...
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 다 너 때문이야! 네가 1999년 기행문이니 뭐니 하는 헛소리를 지껄이는 바람에...

segments.text: ... and lured us into this random sea, in order to torture us, afflict us, and now feed us to the fish!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: ... 우리를 이 이상한 바다로 끌고 와서 고문하고, 괴롭히고, 이제는 물고기 밥으로 만들려고 하는군!

segments.text: Go ahead. Give us the wicked villain laugh, you Manus mole! Quit playing innocent here!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 어서 해봐. 사악한 악역 웃음소리 말이야, 이 재건의 손 첩자 놈! 그만 순진한 척하라고!

segments.text: I, I don't know. I mean no harm!
segments.translation: 저, 전 아무것도 몰라요. 억울해요!

segments.text: Ahahah, nice try! See what else you got to say when this Pirate opens your battery cover and finds "Made in Manus" there!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 웃기는 소리! 오늘 그 배터리 덮개를 열어서 안에 'Made in 재건이라고 찍혀 있는지 확인하고 말 테다!

segments.text: Please do not shake me *@#...
segments.translation: 제발 흔들지 마세요*@#...

segments.text: If ... If I broadcast How to Clean Kitchen Appliances for you now, will it brighten up your mood?
segments.translation: 지, 지금 제가 주방용품 청소법을 방송해드리면 기분이 좀 나아지실까요?

segments.text: Like hell, it will! Can't you see? My ship is going down! Along with my record collection and your battery cover! To the bottom of the sea!For good!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 말도 안 돼! 안 보여? 내 배가 가라앉고 있다고! 내 음반 컬렉션이랑 네 배터리 커버까지 다 같이! 바다 밑바닥으로! 영영 말이야!

segments.text: Even John Lennon can't do anything about it now!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 존 레논을 데려와도 안 돼!

segments.text: I'm terribly sorry. I can't see. I could only touch, hear, and imagine ...
segments.translation: 죄송합니다. 저는 눈이 없어서 촉각과 청각으로 상상할 수밖에 없어요...

segments.text: How about this program, Lesson 101: The Express Route to Heaven One Shouldn't Miss? I think it would serve you better.
segments.translation: 이 프로그램은 어떠세요? 놓치면 안 되는 천국행 급행열차 101강이요. 이게 더 도움이 되실 것 같은데요.

segments.text: Aaarrh! I can't stand this anymore!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 으아악! 더 이상 못 참겠어!

segments.text: My records, my Dr. Pappers, my pirate radio, my Rockin' APPLe Ⅱ!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 내 레코드, 닥터 페퍼, 해적 라디오, APPLe호 로큰롤 2세!

segments.text: For crying out loud, what have I done to deserve this!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 아, 열 받아. 대체 뭘 잘못했다고 이런 꼴을 당해야 하는 거야!

segments.text: A soothing song comes on the radio.
segments.translation: 은은한 음악 소리가 라디오에서 들려온다.

segments.text: Well, she did try her best to pick the music.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 확실히 선곡하느라 애썼네.

segments.text: Though no one is in the mood, I think this piece is not bad.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 듣고 싶어 하는 사람은 없지만, 그래도 센스는 나쁘지 않다고 생각해.

segments.text: As to Regulus's question ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그리고 레굴루스의 질문에 답하자면...

segments.text: We need to slightly twiddle this knob.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 이 손잡이를 살짝 돌려야 해.

segments.text: This is ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 이게 무슨...

segments.text: The official letter of appointment from the Foundation.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 재단의 정식 임명장이야.

segments.text: Congratulations, Vertin. After the long evaluation period and the re-examination ...
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 축하해, 버틴. 긴 평가 기간과 재심사를 거쳐서...

segments.text: The Storm Reformation: Manpower and Discipline has been officially approved by the Pax Security Council.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 인류 평화 안전 이사회에서 폭풍우 개혁안: 인력과 규율이 정식으로 승인됐어.

segments.text: Team Timekeeper is now a legitimate independent department.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 타임키퍼 소대는 법적으로 인정 받은 독립 부서가 될 거야.

segments.text: You are now granted more flexible autonomy and independent budget.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 더 유연한 자주권과 독립적인 예산을 갖게 된다는 거지.

segments.text: They’ve been waiting in the suitcase for this document for far too long.
segments.translation: 그들은 이 문서를 위해 가방 안에서 너무 오랫동안 기다리고 있었다.

segments.text: What was that? Did you say budget?!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 뭐라고? 예산!

segments.text: Does that mean the Foundation will buy … assign me a new ship?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 그럼 재단에서 로큰롤 배를 새로 사주... 아니, 배정해 주려나

segments.text: Unfortunately, "independent" means "doesn't rely on others."
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 안타깝게도 독립적이란 건 남에게 의존하지 않는다는 의미이기도 하지.

segments.text: I can apply for a ship for you, but it's not guaranteed.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 대신 신청해 줄 수는 있겠지만, 결과는 장담 못 해.

segments.text: Tsk, misers!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 에휴, 되게 쩨쩨하게 구네!

segments.text: Fine. Not that I wanted an obsolete ship painted in grayish shepherd check.
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 됐어. 다른 컬러는 찾아볼 수도 없는 무채색 체크무늬 고물 배 따위는 나도 사양이라고

segments.text: Regulus mumbles and walks away. She has entirely lost interest in this conversation.
segments.translation: 레굴루스는 중얼거리며 자리를 떠난다. 그녀는 이 대화에 완전히 흥미를 잃어버렸다.

segments.text: However, the price of passing that bill is to let the Foundation keep its authority to discipline unregistered arcanists.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 하지만 그 법안이 통과된 대가로 재단은 미등록 마도학자들을 처벌할 권한을 유지하게 됐어.

segments.text: The arcanists who have been and will be assigned to Timekeeper's team will be put through a risk assessment procedure carried out by the Foundation.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 타임키퍼 팀에 배속되었거나 배속될 예정인 마도학자들은 모두 재단에서 실시하는 위험 평가 절차를 거치게 될 거야.

segments.text: Those who are in lower-risk categories only need to receive primary artificial somnambulism training, while the high-risk ones will go to the School of Discipline.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 저위험군으로 분류된 자들은 기초 인공 몽유병 훈련만 받으면 되고, 고위험군은 규율 학교로 보내질 거야.

segments.text: But I will make sure they will be registered as members of Team Timekeeper when they enroll.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 하지만 그들이 입학할 때는 타임키퍼 소대의 멤버로 등록되도록 내가 보장할게.

segments.text: I see. I have only one question.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: ...알겠습니다. 한 가지 궁금한 게 있는데요.

segments.text: Are you still our point of contact for the Foundation, Madam Z?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 재단에서 우리와 컨택하는 건 여전히 Z 씨가 담당하시나요?

segments.text: Yes, of course.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 물론이지.

segments.text: Then I have no further questions.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그럼 더 이상 질문은 없습니다.

segments.text: A smile breaks on Madam Z's lip.
segments.translation: Z의 입가에 미소가 떠올랐다.

segments.text: Meanwhile, Team Timekeeper can apply for secondment from the Foundation, Laplace, and Zeno, if necessary.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 필요하다면 타임키퍼 소대도 재단과 라플라스, 제노에서 파견을 신청할 수 있어.

segments.text: You can check this file for more details.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 자세한 내용은 이 서류를 확인해 봐.

segments.text: Ms. Z hands over a supplemental clause of considerable thickness.
segments.translation: Z 씨가 상당한 두께의 보충 조항을 건넸다.

segments.text: Fortunately, there are other things in more dire need of being checked for now.
segments.translation: 다행히 지금 당장 더 시급하게 확인해야 할 다른 일들이 있었다.

segments.text: It stays the same—keep investigating the "Storm" and Manus Vindictae.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 그대로야. 폭풍우와 재건의 손을 조사하는 일.

segments.text: You can make your own plans of action. The Foundation only needs a monthly report on the result.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 행동 계획은 네가 직접 세워도 돼. 재단은 월간 결과 보고서만 받으면 되거든.

segments.text: You are the first-in-command, Vertin.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 최고 지휘권은 자네에게 있어, 버틴.

segments.text: Okay.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 알겠어.

segments.text: You already have a target, I assume?
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 벌써 목표가 생긴 모양이지?

segments.text: That base the Manus used to keep its Olitiaus four years ago. It has never been reversed by the "Storm."
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 4년 전, 재건의 손이 오리티우 사육용으로 쓰던 기지가 있는데... 그곳은 폭풍우로 인한 타임슬립이 없었어요.

segments.text: I'd like to investigate that place again.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그곳을 다시 조사해보고 싶어요.

segments.text: So you've been there many times.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 이미 여러 번 그곳에 가본 모양이군.

segments.text: Well, that'd make a good start for Team Timekeeper.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 뭐, 좋아. 타임키퍼 소대의 시작점으로 꽤 어울리는 곳이야.

segments.text: I'll arrange for some people to meet you at the base.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 기지에서 지원할 인력을 준비해 두지.

segments.text: Heh heh ... I think you'll have a great time together.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 헤헤... 둘이 잘 지낼 것 같은데.

segments.text: Oh. The fog is thick here. A-choo!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 안개가 장난이 아닌데... 에취!

segments.text: The mist hangs heavy in the valley, and the temperature is somewhat uncomfortable for those accustomed to the suitcase.
segments.translation: 계곡에 안개가 짙게 드리워져 있고, 여행가방에 익숙한 이들에게는 다소 불편한 기온이었다.

segments.text: It used to be the nest of Olitiaus, a kind of creature resting in valleys with abundant water resources.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 여긴 예전에 오리티우의 소굴이었던 곳이야. 오리티우는 수원이 풍부한 산골짜기에 주로 머물거든.

segments.text: What's more, it's winter now.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 게다가, 마침 또 겨울이군...

segments.text: The leaves are indeed covered with a thin skin of frost.
segments.translation: 나뭇잎에 서리가 엷게 내려앉아 있었다.

segments.text: Regulus clicks her tongue and eyes the fog-shrouded Gate of Zeno.
segments.translation: 레굴루스가 혀를 차며 안개로 뒤덮인 제노의 정문을 바라보았다.

segments.text: So, why do I have to be the errand girl? The Foundation wasn't even planning to give me a ship!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 그런데 왜 내가 심부름꾼 노릇을 해야 하는 거야? 재단에서는 나한테 배를 줄 생각도 없었잖아!

segments.text: Ms. Sonetto is going through the procedures in the headquarters to transfer herself to Team Timekeeper.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 소네트 씨는 현재 본부에서 타임키퍼 소대로의 편제 이동 절차를 진행하는 중입니다.

segments.text: Ms. Druvis and Sotheby are on a break, for they have spent much time and energy clearing the woods and repairing the Foundation's square.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 드루비스 씨와 소더비 씨는 재단 광장 숲의 정비 작업으로 기력을 많이 소모해서 아직 휴식 중입니다.

segments.text: Ms. Lilya has been given an administrative penalty because she broke into the Rehabilitation Center not long ago.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 릴리아 씨는 얼마 전 재활 센터에 침입해서 행정 처분을 받았습니다.

segments.text: This leads us to the current situation, where only the Captain and this APPLe are able to act freely.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 그래서 현재로선 캡틴과 저 APPLe만이 자유롭게 행동할 수 있는 상황입니다.

segments.text: What?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 뭐라고?

segments.text: So in the end, was I, the renowned rocking pirate, the only one who didn't cause any damage to the Foundation buildings?!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 결국 유명한 록킹 해적인 내가 재단 건물에 피해를 전혀 주지 않은 유일한 사람이었다는 거야?!

segments.text: Ugh! I have never felt so humiliated in my life!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 으으으, 내 생에 이런 굴욕은 처음이야...!

segments.text: You're not planning on destroying this place now, are you, Regulus?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 지금 이곳을 박살내려는 건 아니겠지, 레굴루스?

segments.text: No, no. Emm?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 그럴 리가... 음?

segments.text: Hey, see who's here! Lilya and a stranger!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 이봐, 저게 누구야?! 릴리아랑... 처음 보는 녀석이 하나 있는데!

segments.text: Next to the rusty iron door, Lilya squats on her hunkers, looking extremely bored.
segments.translation: 녹슨 철문 옆에서 릴리아가 쪼그려 앉아 극도로 지루해하고 있었다.

segments.text: What took you so long? Fell into a gutter?
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 뭘 그렇게 오래 걸렸어? 하수구에라도 빠졌나?

segments.text: A graceful stranger is standing next to her.
segments.translation: 그녀의 옆에는 단정한 모습의 낯선 이가 서 있다.

segments.text: Hello, Timekeeper.
segments.translation: 안녕하세요, 타임키퍼.

segments.text: My name is Moissan. My employee ID is SF27602191908238X. I believe Madam Z has told you about me.
segments.speaker: Ms. Moissan
segments.translation: 제 이름은 모이산입니다. 사원번호는 SF27602191908238X입니다. Z 여사께서 저에 대해 말씀해 주셨을 거라 생각합니다.

segments.text: I am now an official member of your team.
segments.speaker: Ms. Moissan
segments.translation: 이제 저는 당신 팀의 정식 멤버입니다.

segments.text: Ms. Moissan, welcome to the team. Madam Z said you're an excellent tutor in arcanum.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 모이산 씨, 팀에 오신 걸 환영해요. 마담 Z가 그러는데 마도학 분야에서 뛰어난 튜터라고 하더군요.

segments.text: She's too kind to say so. In fact, I have a lot to learn from you.
segments.speaker: Ms. Moissan
segments.translation: 그분이 너무 착하셔서 그런 말씀을 못 하시는 거예요. 사실 제가 당신에게서 배울 게 많거든요.

segments.text: Also, thank you for taking good care of Ms. Sotheby.
segments.speaker: Ms. Moissan
segments.translation: 그리고 소더비 양을 잘 돌봐주셔서 감사합니다.

segments.text: Hold on, you know Sotheby?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 잠깐, 당신 소더비랑 아는 사이야?

segments.text: According to Madam Z, Ms. Moissan used to be Sotheby's private teacher.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: Z 씨께 예전에 모이산 씨가 소더비의 가정교사였다고 들었어.

segments.text: It is a long story.
segments.speaker: Ms. Moissan
segments.translation: 긴 이야기예요.

segments.text: Let Ms. Lilya give us an introduction to the base first. As the field operator, she knows this place better.
segments.speaker: Ms. Moissan
segments.translation: 먼저 릴리야 씨가 기지에 대해 소개해 주도록 하자. 현장 요원인 그녀가 이곳을 더 잘 알고 있으니까.

segments.text: Ms. Moissan smiles toward the flying witch beside her, who has started to yawn.
segments.translation: 모이산 씨가 옆에서 하품을 시작한 하늘을 나는 마녀를 향해 미소를 지었다.

segments.text: Someone clearly has grown tired of this humdrum small talk.
segments.translation: 안 그래도 이런 상투적인 인사가 지긋지긋한 참이었다.

segments.text: Hah! After I got promoted and transferred to the headquarters, those exciting outbound missions have been removed from my schedule.
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 하! 승진해서 본부로 발령받고 나니까, 그 흥미진진했던 외근 임무들이 내 스케줄에서 다 빠져버렸어.

segments.text: In short, although it's called the base ...
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 간단히 말해서, 기지라고 부르긴 하지만...

segments.text: The only place unaffected by the "Storm" is a narrow, 20-meter-long corridor, no larger than a hunter's lodge.
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 「폭풍우」의 영향을 받지 않은 곳은 사냥꾼의 오두막보다도 작은, 길이 20미터의 좁은 복도뿐이야.

segments.text: My former fellows had already searched this place from top to bottom.
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 내 옛 동료들이 이미 이곳을 샅샅이 뒤져봤어.

segments.text: Those Laplace dudes had even sent in their lab dogs to search here inch by inch. Found nothing but some excrement of the Olitiaus and the dogs' own poop.
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 라플라스 놈들이 실험용 개들까지 보내서 여기를 샅샅이 뒤졌거든. 올리티아우스 똥이랑 개들 똥밖에 못 찾았지만 말이야.

segments.text: There might be some clues that are invisible.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 하지만 보이지 않는 단서가 숨겨져 있을지도 모르잖아.

segments.text: Regulus is a specialist in optical arcane skills, maybe she can find something.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 레굴루스는 광학 마도술 전문가니까, 뭔가 찾을 수 있을 거야.

segments.text: A specialist? Ahem ... Well, I'll take that as a compliment.
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 전문가? 크흠... 칭찬으로 받아들일게.

segments.text: But for the record, compared to searching, hiding treasures is more of a pirate's lot!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 하지만 말이야, 보물을 찾는 것보다 숨기는 게 진짜 해적다운 일이라고!

segments.text: So if it were up to me to hide treasures in this place ...
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 나한테 이곳에 보물을 숨겨보라고 한다면...

segments.text: Regulus walks into the depths of the river valley.
segments.translation: 레굴루스가 계곡 깊은 곳을 향해 걸어간다.

segments.text: Please hold on for a second, Captain Regulus.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 잠깐만 기다려 주세요, 레굴루스 캡틴.

segments.text: The fog seems abnormally thick.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 여긴 안개가 비정상적으로 짙군요.

segments.text: Regulus halts and hesitates. Slowly, she turns her head.
segments.translation: 멈칫하고 걸음을 멈춘 레굴루스가 천천히 고개를 돌렸다.

segments.text: Whaaa! Ambush! Ambush! These prats nearly shot my hat off!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 으악! 누가 날 노리고 있는 거야?! 하, 하마터면 모자가 벗겨질 뻔했잖아!

segments.text: Lucky you. They hit the jackpot right away.
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 운이 좋네. 바로 대박을 터뜨렸잖아.

segments.text: Hmm. There shouldn't be any ambush in this place.
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 흠. 이곳에는 매복이 없을 거야.

segments.text: Easy, Ms. Regulus. Please carefully retreat to my side!
segments.speaker: Ms. Moissan
segments.translation: 진정해, 레굴루스. 조심스럽게 내 쪽으로 후퇴해!

segments.text: Ms. Timekeeper, please cover us!
segments.speaker: Ms. Moissan
segments.translation: 타임키퍼님, 저희를 엄호해 주세요!

segments.text: Hold on, hold on!
segments.translation: 잠깐, 잠깐만요!

segments.text: It was a misunderstanding, Timekeeper. We attacked to defend ourselves. We are not the enemy!
segments.translation: 오해하지 마세요, 타임키퍼. 방금 그건 방어 차원의 공격이었어요. 저희는 적이 아닙니다!

segments.text: The looming figures from the other side of the fog have their hands high in the air.
segments.translation: 안개 너머에서 나타난 거대한 인영들이 두 손을 높이 들고 있었다.

segments.text: We are the investigators from the Foundation. These are our IDs.
segments.speaker: Female Investigator
segments.translation: 저희는 재단 소속 조사원입니다. 신분증이에요.

segments.text: Ms. Moissan carefully takes their IDs and nods her head.
segments.translation: 조심스럽게 신분증을 건네받은 무아상은 고개를 끄덕였다.

segments.text: The base has been deserted long ago, right? What's the purpose of the investigation now?
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 기지는 진작에 버려진 거 아냐? 지금 와서 조사할 이유가 뭐야?

segments.text: The outside world has been reversed to 1913. We are here to collect the lost scientific devices from the 1970s.
segments.speaker: Female Investigator
segments.translation: 외부 세계는 1913년으로 역행했습니다. 저희는 1970년대의 실종된 과학 장비들을 수집하러 왔어요.

segments.text: Science and technologies are regressing rapidly due to the "Storm." Those old devices, which used to be outdated, have become valuable to us.
segments.speaker: Male Investigator
segments.translation: 폭풍우 때문에 과학 기술이 급속도로 퇴보하고 있습니다. 예전에는 구식이었던 그 장치들이 이제는 저희에게 귀중한 자료가 되었어요.

segments.text: I see. Do you mind us investigating this place? It won't be long.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: ...알겠습니다, 그럼 우리도 여기서 조사해도 될까요? 시간은 많이 안 걸릴 겁니다.

segments.text: Sure, we are glad to give you a hand if you need it, Timekeeper.
segments.speaker: Female Investigator
segments.translation: 물론이죠, 타임키퍼님께서 필요하시다면 언제든지 도와드리겠습니다.

segments.text: Good. I have some questions about the base, and I wonder if you may help.
segments.speaker: Ms. Moissan
segments.translation: 좋아요. 기지에 대해 몇 가지 궁금한 게 있는데, 도움을 받을 수 있을까요?

segments.text: She quickly starts talking to the investigators, as if they have been long acquainted.
segments.translation: 그녀는 오랜 지인이라도 되는 듯 조사원들과 재빠르게 이야기를 나누기 시작했다.

segments.text: Tsk, so it's just a mistake. Back to treasure hunting now?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 에휴, 그냥 오해였나 보네~ 그럼 이제 다시 보물을 찾을 때인가?

segments.text: Regulus swaggers into the base, inspecting the dusty boxes one by one.
segments.translation: 당당하게 기지로 들어간 레굴루스는 먼지가 내려앉은 물자 상자를 하나씩 살폈다.

segments.text: Let's see what Zeno and Laplace have left here.
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 어디 제노와 라플라스가 여기에 뭘 버리고 갔나 좀 볼까...

segments.text: Infrared shotgun ... Maglev auto feeder ... K-tope Calibrator ... My God, and a full box of Laplace's military chocolate!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 적외선 엽총... 자기 부상 자동 급식기... K 동위 원소 검측기... 세상에, 라플라스 군용 초콜릿 박스잖아!

segments.text: Vertin! Come check it out! This is all good stuff! Solid MREs!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 버틴! 빨리 와 봐, 내가 끝내주는 걸 찾았어! 고열량 전투식량이야!

segments.text: Ahem, this Pirate with a heart of gold wouldn't mind tasting it for you.
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: ...크흠, 이 해적님이 대신 먼저 맛을 봐주지...

segments.text: I don't mean to rain on your parade. But even dogs won't eat those things. It makes Olitiaus' excrement smell better in comparison.
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 분위기 깨서 미안한데, 개도 안 먹을 거야 그런 건. 올리티아우스 똥이 그것보다 향기로울 정도라고.

segments.text: That being said, to the best of this APPLe's knowledge, canine animals shouldn't have consumed any food which contains theobromine anyhow.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 하지만 이 APPLe이 알기로는 갯과 동물은 어떤 경우든 테오브로민이 함유된 음식을 섭취해서는 안 되는 걸로 알고 있습니다.

segments.text: Emm. Then can I have it or not?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 음... 그럼 먹어야 해, 말아야 해?

segments.text: There is nothing to be worried about since the Captain is not an animal of the Canidae family.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 물론 캡틴은 갯과 동물이 아니니, 그런 제한은 없습니다.

segments.text: Well said! As befits the first mate of mine!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 맞아! 역시 우리 일등 항해사야!

segments.text: Regulus happily lifts the small supply box that is placed on the chocolates.
segments.translation: 레굴루스는 신난 듯 초콜릿을 짓누르던 작은 물자 상자를 품에 안았다.

segments.text: Wait a second, Regulus.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 잠깐만, 레굴루스.

segments.text: Show me the thing in your arms.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 품에 든 거, 좀 보여줘.

segments.text: Why, what do you want? Feel like my chocolate now?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 아, 왜? 아까는 아무 말 없었으면서, 이제 와서 내 초콜릿을 뺏으려고?

segments.text: No, the supply box.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 아니, 물자 상자 말이야.

segments.text: It has my name on it.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 내 이름이 새겨져 있어.

segments.text: Regulus lets out a gasp, and the wooden box in her hand lurches forward.
segments.translation: 레굴루스의 비명과 함께 손에 든 목제 상자가 흔들렸다.

segments.text: Whoa, true!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 으악, 진짜네!

segments.text: Are there any other "Vertin" in the Foundation?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 재단에 다른 버틴도 있는 거야?

segments.text: As far as I know, no one is called by that name but me.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 내가 알기로 그 이름으로 불리는 건 나밖에 없어.

segments.text: Lilya squints her eyes and knocks at the solid edge of the box.
segments.translation: 릴리아는 눈을 가늘게 뜬 채 단단한 상자의 가장자리를 툭툭 두드렸다.

segments.text: Looks like an ordinary wooden box. But these "ordinary" boxes are always the most dangerous.
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 평범한 나무 상자로 보이는군. 하지만 이런 평범한 상자들이 항상 가장 위험해.

segments.text: Not far away from them, Ms. Moissan is still talking to the investigators and hasn't noticed what is happening here.
segments.translation: 그들로부터 멀지 않은 곳에서 무아상 씨는 여전히 조사원들과 이야기를 나누고 있어 이곳에서 벌어지는 일을 눈치채지 못하고 있었다.

segments.text: Hmm. So, turns out we did find something useful in this treasure hunt?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 음... 그러니까 이번 보물찾기에서 진짜로 전리품을 찾아냈다 이거지?

segments.text: It even has Vertin's name on it, like a celebrity autograph. A treasure indeed!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 버틴 이름까지 딱 박혀 있잖아. 이건 전용 사인처럼 귀중한 거야!

segments.text: Regulus, wait, don't …
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 잠깐만, 레굴루스. 일단은...

segments.text: No one can stop a pirate from opening her fresh trophy!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 해적이 새로운 전리품을 여는 걸 그 누구도 막을 수 없어!

segments.text: Regulus immediately opens the box.
segments.translation: 레굴루스가 재빠르게 상자를 열었다.

segments.text: Her first glimpse is of a blue flower that stands out in the surroundings.
segments.translation: 그녀가 처음 본 것은 주변에서 유독 눈에 띄는 파란 꽃이었다.

segments.text: Then, she hears a bizarre static noise.
segments.translation: 그리고 이내 귀에 거슬리는 기괴한 전류 음이 들려왔다.

segments.text: News of the day.
segments.translation: 오늘의 소식을 전해드립니다.

segments.text: The outcasts held the 11,231st pep rally in the Mammoth Cave, Kentucky. They eventually unanimously passed the principle of "dozing in spring, relaxing in summer, slacking off in autumn, and hibernating in winter."
segments.translation: 아웃사이더들이 켄터키주 매머드 동굴에서 11,231번째 격려 집회를 열었어. 결국 만장일치로 봄엔 졸고, 여름엔 쉬고, 가을엔 빈둥거리고, 겨울엔 동면하기 원칙을 통과시켰지.

segments.text: Practical Modern Incantations has now been reissued for the 77th time. We are now at the end of the 20th century. This book still remains the number one book on the list of "Most Regretful Purchase on Classic Score" by The New Yorker.
segments.translation: 『실용 현대 주문학』이 77번째 개정판을 발행했습니다. 이제 20세기 말이 되었죠. 이 책은 여전히 뉴요커지의 클래식 스코어 최악의 구매 후회 도서 목록 1위를 차지하고 있어요.

segments.text: Biographer Urd has recently published her latest travel notes, Roaming in Apeiron, which has started a new round of craze for traveling in the Aegean Sea region.
segments.translation: 전기 작가 우르드가 최근 출간한 최신 기행문 <아페이론 유랑기>가 에게해 열풍을 일으키고 있습니다.

segments.text: The chief editor of Voice of the Millennium strongly recommends this book, praising it to be the literary reproduction of the romantic, elegant, and classical dreams, a glimpse at the Golden Era!
segments.translation: 『천년의 목소리』 편집장이 강력 추천하는 작품으로, 낭만적이고 우아하며 고전적인 꿈의 문학적 재현이자 황금시대를 엿볼 수 있는 걸작이라고 극찬했습니다!

segments.text: Among them, criticisms abound. The Babylonian Review issued a warning that the author's observation of the Apollo Star was fatally inaccurate.
segments.translation: 그중에서도 비판의 목소리가 높습니다. 바빌로니아 리뷰에서는 저자의 아폴로 별 관측이 치명적으로 부정확하다며 경고를 발표했죠.

segments.text: Self-driving tourists can easily get lost in the Gorgon Current backwash if they do not correct their direction by 3.14° on the Ford Sextant Model T.
segments.translation: 자율 주행 관광객들은 포드 육분의 Model T에서 3.14도만큼 방향을 보정하지 않으면 고르곤 해류의 역류에서 쉽게 길을 잃을 수 있습니다.

segments.text: Time for late-night news ...
segments.translation: 시청자 여러분께 심야 뉴스를 전해드립니다...

segments.text: What ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 이게 무슨...

segments.text: End of the 20th century ... Voice of the Millennium ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 20세기 말, <밀레니엄의 목소리>...

segments.text: Is this radio broadcasting news in 1999?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 지금 1999년 뉴스를 틀어주는 거야?

segments.text: *crash sound*
segments.translation: 충돌음

segments.text: The ritual from afar interrupts the broadcast.
segments.translation: 먼 곳에서 전해지는 의식에 방송이 끊어졌다.

segments.text: Just as I suspected.
segments.speaker: Ms. Moissan
segments.translation: 역시 내 예상대로군.

segments.text: She puts away her usual smile, the glowing light of a spell gathering at her fingertips.
segments.translation: 그녀가 평소의 미소를 거두어들이자, 손끝에 마도술의 빛나는 광채가 모여들었다.

segments.text: Since Timekeeper hasn't reported the time of this era to the Foundation ...
segments.speaker: Ms. Moissan
segments.translation: 타임키퍼가 아직 이 시대의 시간을 재단에 보고하지 않았으니...

segments.text: You two, as the Foundation's investigators, shouldn't have known what year this is.
segments.speaker: Ms. Moissan
segments.translation: 너희 둘, 재단의 조사원이라면 지금이 몇 년도인지 알 리가 없을 텐데.

segments.text: In front of her, the fog parts, revealing two familiar figures.
segments.translation: 그녀 앞에서 안개가 걷히며 익숙한 두 형체가 모습을 드러냈다.

segments.text: BLEEHHAA!!
segments.speaker: The Manus Believer
segments.translation: 블리이하아!!

segments.text: In such pouring rain, time is the best proof of identity.
segments.speaker: Ms. Moissan
segments.translation: 이렇게 쏟아지는 비 속에서는, 시간이야말로 신원을 증명하는 최고의 방법이지.

segments.text: Hah, I get it. Not a bad plot.
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 하, 알겠어. 나쁘지 않은 각본이네.

segments.text: Ms. Moissan, watch your six! Let us help you!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 뒤를 조심해요, 무아상 씨! 우리가 도울게요!

segments.text: When the fog is cleared, the enemies are gone.
segments.translation: 안개가 걷히자 적들은 사라졌다.

segments.text: There's nothing else to be seen in the valley except for the supply boxes scattered on the ground.
segments.translation: 계곡에는 땅에 흩어진 보급 상자들 외에는 볼 것이 없었다.

segments.text: Tsk, didn't expect them to be clever enough to disguise themselves as the Foundation's investigators. They sure have learnt a thing or two.
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 쳇, 성 파블로프 재단 조사원으로 변장할 정도로 영리할 줄은 몰랐네. 제법 한 수 배웠구만.

segments.text: The "era" of 1929 only lasted for two days. The frequent change of time muddles work and responsibilities in the Foundation, which in turn caused some chaos within it.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 1929년의 시대는 단 이틀밖에 지속되지 않았어. 빈번한 시간 변화로 재단 내 업무와 책임이 뒤섞이면서 내부에 혼란이 일어났지.

segments.text: Luckily, Ms. Moissan noticed the signs of it at the beginning.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 다행히 무아상 씨가 처음부터 단서를 발견했네요.

segments.text: Timekeeper, please take a look at this box.
segments.speaker: Ms. Moissan
segments.translation: 타임키퍼, 이 상자 좀 봐주세요.

segments.text: I'm afraid this is what they came here for.
segments.speaker: Ms. Moissan
segments.translation: 유감스럽게도 이것이 그들이 여기 온 목적인 것 같아요.

segments.text: Ms. Moissan turns aside, revealing the newly opened supply box in front of her.
segments.translation: 무아상이 옆으로 비켜서자, 개봉된 새 물자 상자가 모습을 드러냈다.

segments.text: Unlike the long-abandoned Laplace instruments, it is not yet soaked by the rain and mist here.
segments.translation: 오랫동안 방치된 라플라스의 기기와 달리, 아직 이곳의 빗물과 안개에 젖지 않았다.

segments.text: This is ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 이게 무슨...

segments.text: The Manus mask they used to stay immune to the "Storm"?!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 재건의 손이 폭풍우에 면역을 유지하기 위해 사용한 가면?!

segments.text: I will explain all of these as briefly as possible.
segments.speaker: Mesmer Jr.
segments.translation: 이 모든 것들을 최대한 간단히 설명해드릴게요.

segments.text: Good news.
segments.speaker: Mesmer Jr.
segments.translation: 좋은 소식이야.

segments.text: The analysis report on the mask you submitted to the Scientific Computing Center is now available, Timekeeper.
segments.speaker: Mesmer Jr.
segments.translation: 타임키퍼, 과학 연산 센터에 제출하신 가면 분석 보고서가 나왔습니다.

segments.text: We've found the same component in it as the raindrop from the Storm.
segments.speaker: Mesmer Jr.
segments.translation: 폭풍우에서 온 빗방울과 동일한 성분을 발견했어.

segments.text: This is a component named "asymmetrical nuclide R" by the Scientific Computing Center.
segments.speaker: Mesmer Jr.
segments.translation: 이건 과학 연산 센터에서 비대칭 핵종 R이라고 명명한 부품이야.

segments.text: Its name comes from the bifurcation structure it presents under the arcanum imaging.
segments.speaker: Mesmer Jr.
segments.translation: 그 이름은 마도술 영상화에서 보이는 분기 구조에서 따온 거야.

segments.text: The Scientific Computing Center has also run some tests on the samples of the raindrops you previously submitted. After removing all water, mud, human hair, and dandruff within, the remaining unanalyzable component is what we called "asymmetrical nuclide R."
segments.speaker: Mesmer Jr.
segments.translation: 과학 컴퓨팅 센터에서도 당신이 이전에 제출한 빗방울 샘플들을 대상으로 몇 가지 테스트를 진행했어요. 그 안에 포함된 물, 진흙, 사람 머리카락, 비듬을 모두 제거한 후, 남은 분석 불가능한 성분을 우리는 비대칭 핵종 R이라고 명명했습니다.

segments.text: What a familiar name.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그래, 익숙한 이름이네.

segments.text: Yes. As an expedient, she borrowed the first half of it to make up the answer to the "Three Questions."
segments.translation: 그렇다. 편법으로, 그녀는 세 가지 질문에 대한 답을 만들어내기 위해 그것의 전반부를 빌려왔다.

segments.text: Mesmer Jr. doesn't pay attention to her murmuring.
segments.translation: 메스머 주니어는 그녀의 중얼거림에 신경 쓰지 않는다.

segments.text: But it disappeared right away, and we only have a photo of it.
segments.speaker: Mesmer Jr.
segments.translation: 하지만 바로 사라져버렸고, 우리한테는 사진 한 장밖에 없어.

segments.text: Fortunately, we extracted the stable form of it from the Manus mask.
segments.speaker: Mesmer Jr.
segments.translation: 다행히 재건의 손 가면에서 안정된 형태로 추출할 수 있었어.

segments.text: It might be the key to staying immune to the "Storm."
segments.speaker: Mesmer Jr.
segments.translation: 폭풍우에 면역을 유지하는 열쇠가 될 수도 있어.

segments.text: Does that mean it'll be possible for the Scientific Computing Center to develop protective gears which are immune to the "Storm," like the Manus does?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그럼 과학 연산 센터에서도 재건의 손처럼 폭풍우에 면역인 보호 장비를 개발하는 게 가능하다는 뜻인가?

segments.text: Seems to be so. A credit to you.
segments.speaker: Mesmer Jr.
segments.translation: 그런 것 같네. 자네 덕분이야.

segments.text: The whole center is crazy about it, and I'm responsible for passing along the good news on behalf of my fatigued colleagues who stayed up all night and suffered from neurasthenia.
segments.speaker: Mesmer Jr.
segments.translation: 센터 전체가 이 일로 난리가 났어요. 밤새 잠도 못 자고 신경쇠약에 시달린 동료들을 대신해서 제가 이 좋은 소식을 전해드리는 역할을 맡게 됐고요.

segments.text: Mesmer passes them a heavy leather box.
segments.translation: 메스머는 묵직한 가죽 상자를 건넸다.

segments.text: We need more samples.
segments.speaker: Mesmer Jr.
segments.translation: 샘플이 더 필요해.

segments.text: This is the sampling device for "asymmetrical nuclide R." It's the one and only. The manual is in the interlayer.
segments.speaker: Mesmer Jr.
segments.translation: 이건 비대칭 핵종 R의 샘플링 장치야. 세상에 하나뿐인 거지. 사용 설명서는 중간층에 있어.

segments.text: I'll be careful. Thank you, Mesmer.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 조심할게. 고마워, 메스머.

segments.text: Don't be. I'm just delivering this for someone else.
segments.speaker: Mesmer Jr.
segments.translation: 신경 쓰지 마. 난 그냥 다른 사람 대신 전해주는 것뿐이야.

segments.text: This is the first time she has seen her since waking up.
segments.translation: 깨어난 후 그녀를 본 것은 이번이 처음이었다.

segments.text: How do you feel now? I'm sorry about what happened in the rehab center.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 지금 기분은 어때? 재활 센터에서 일어난 일... 미안해.

segments.text: I'm good. It just helped me further verify some factual information about arcanists.
segments.speaker: Mesmer Jr.
segments.translation: 괜찮아. 덕분에 아르카니스트들에 대한 사실 정보를 더 확인할 수 있었거든.

segments.text: It's just ... I thought you weren't one of them, Vertin.
segments.speaker: Mesmer Jr.
segments.translation: 그냥... 버틴, 너는 그들과 다른 줄 알았는데.

segments.text: Mesmer adjusts her cufflinks and quickly walks away.
segments.translation: 메스머 주니어는 소매 단추의 위치를 바로잡고는 빠른 걸음으로 자리를 떠난다.

segments.text: At the same time, the first assistant rushes from the other side of the corridor.
segments.translation: 그때, 제1조수가 복도 저편에서 급하게 다가왔다.

segments.text: I just heard some spirit-lifting news at the hall. Phenomenal achievement, Timekeeper!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: ...로비에서 기쁜 소식을 들었어요. 정말 대단한 성과예요, 타임키퍼!

segments.text: Sonetto's face brightens with sheer delight.
segments.translation: 소네트의 얼굴에 기쁨이라는 감정이 고스란히 드러났다.

segments.text: She has changed back into her familiar attire.
segments.translation: 그녀는 예전의 익숙한 옷차림으로 돌아와 있었다.

segments.text: It's a tremendous breakthrough in our fight with Manus Vindictae. Everyone at the headquarters is cheering.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 재건의 손과의 싸움에서 엄청난 돌파구를 마련한 거예요. 본부의 모든 사람들이 환호하고 있어요.

segments.text: Although I don't know what this component really is. Is it a kind of ritual or a unique substance?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 그 성분이 뭘 가리키는 건지는 잘 모르겠지만요... 주문인가요? 아니면 독특한 물질?

segments.text: That'll be the next thing to find out in our investigation, I think.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그게 바로 우리가 이어서 조사해야 할 부분일 거야.

segments.text: Manus Vindictae always has more information on the "Storm" and how to be immune to it. We've been trying our best to keep up with their progress.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그게 폭풍우든 폭풍우를 피할 수단이든, 재건의 손이 우리보다 더 많은 정보를 쥐고 있어. 그 격차를 줄이기 위해 최대한 노력할 수밖에 없겠지.

segments.text: Fortunately, now we have another direction.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 다행히 우리가 더 조사해 볼 구석이 있어.

segments.text: Oh, and these are the files you asked me to search for.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: ...참, 부탁하신 자료예요.

segments.text: Sonetto hands out a stack of magazines with yellowing covers, each corner carefully flattened.
segments.translation: 소네트는 누렇게 바랜 낡은 잡지 뭉치를 건넸다. 잡지는 모서리마다 곱게 펴져 있었다.

segments.text: Luckily, the SPDM library has every single issue of Global Arcane Geography since the 1960s.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 운 좋게도 제1방어선 학교 도서관에서 60년대 이후 발행된 《세계 마도학 지리》를 모두 소장하고 있었어요.

segments.text: Also, Ms. Sotheby accepted your request.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 소더비 씨도 타임키퍼의 요청에 동의했고요.

segments.text: Thank you, Sonetto.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 고마워, 소네트.

segments.text: With these files and the help of Regulus ... That should be enough.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 이 파일들과 레굴루스의 도움이 있으면... 충분할 거야.

segments.text: The figures of the big names are moving between piles of paperwork ...
segments.translation: 거물들의 모습이 서류 더미 사이를 오가고 있다...

segments.text: And someone is in big trouble.
segments.translation: 어떤 인물은 도탄에 빠져 있었다.

segments.text: Haha, yeah, go on, what else do you get except for playing dumb? You cunning flower-headed tin box!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 하하, 그래, 계속해봐, 모자란 척하는 것 말고 또 뭘 할 줄 아는데? 이 교활한 머리에 꽃 단 깡통 놈!

segments.text: Speak! Tell us what you know!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 어서 네가 아는 대로 불어!

segments.text: Like what were you doing in the Olitiau's base? In what way are you associated with Manus Vindictae? And who put you in that box which has Vertin's name on it?!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 올리티아우 기지에서 뭘 하고 있었던 거야? 재건의 손과는 어떤 관계고? 그리고 버틴 이름이 적힌 그 상자 안에 널 집어넣은 건 누구야?!

segments.text: I, I have no idea.
segments.translation: ...저, 전 몰라요...

segments.text: The rockin' pirate advances while her hostage slowly retreats.
segments.translation: 점점 다가오는 로큰롤 해적의 모습에 철제 인질이 슬금슬금 뒷걸음질 쳤다.

segments.text: Till she knocks into someone more callous.
segments.translation: 그 순간, 더 무자비한 존재에게 부딪히고 말았다.

segments.text: And those ridiculous radio programs, end of the 20th century, Voice of the Millennium, and Roaming in Apeiron ...
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 그리고 그 우스꽝스러운 라디오 프로그램들, 20세기 말, 밀레니엄의 목소리, 아페이론 로밍...

segments.text: Don't waste our time. Otherwise, we have no choice but bathe you with this bottle of vodka.
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 시간 낭비하지 마. 안 그러면 이 보드카 한 병을 네게 다 부어줄 수밖에 없거든.

segments.text: Geez, do you really mean that? Anything less cruel?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: ...저기, 진심이야? 그건 너무 잔인하지 않아?

segments.text: Formalin, of course! I never waste my drinks.
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 당연히 포르말린이지! 난 절대 술을 낭비하지 않거든.

segments.text: Yeah, that's more like it!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 그래, 그게 훨씬 좋은 생각이네!

segments.text: The kidnappers smile grimly.
segments.translation: 납치범들이 회심의 미소를 지었다.

segments.text: But I, I really don't know anything.
segments.translation: ...하지만 저, 저는 정말 아무것도 모르는걸요...

segments.text: I'm just the receiver of signals. Please believe me!
segments.translation: 전 무선 신호를 받았을 뿐이에요. 제발 믿어주세요!

segments.text: When I woke up, I was already in that box!
segments.translation: 제가 깨어났을 땐 이미 그 상자에 들어간 후였어요!

segments.text: This interrogation won't get us anywhere.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 이렇게 물어봐서는 별 소득이 없을 거야.

segments.text: Laplace didn't detect any unusual arcane marks on her.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 라플라스도 그녀에게서 별다른 마도술 흔적을 찾아내지 못했어.

segments.text: But she was there with those Manus pawns in that base!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 하지만 이 녀석은 그 재건의 손 놈들과 같이 그 기지에 있었잖아!

segments.text: Say anything you want, she will still be a solid suspect.
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 뭐라고 하든 상관없어, 그 애는 여전히 유력한 용의자야.

segments.text: Yes, I understand what you mean. But for now, the evidence can't support our speculation.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 네가 무슨 말을 하려는지 알겠어. 하지만 지금으로서는 증거가 우리 추측을 뒷받침하기에 부족해.

segments.text: A field trip may be helpful, I guess.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 아무래도 현장 조사가 더 소득이 있을 것 같아.

segments.text: What's your plan? Will you come with me?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 계획이 있어? 나와 함께 갈래?

segments.text: I've informed Madam Z. This will be the first official field mission of our team.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: Z 씨께 알려드렸어요. 이번이 우리 팀의 첫 공식 현장 임무가 될 거예요.

segments.text: Sotheby and Druvis are still on leave. They will not take part in this action.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 소더비와 드루비스 씨는 아직 휴가 중이라서 이번 작전에 참여하지 않아.

segments.text: While Ms. Moissan will stay put in the Foundation's headquarters as our contact.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 무아상 씨는 우리 연락책으로 재단 본부에 남을 거고.

segments.text: Wait, a field mission?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 잠깐, 현장 조사라고...?

segments.text: Didn't we just come back from that Olitiau base? Besides, where is this "field"?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 우린 이제 막 오리티우 기지에서 돌아왔잖아? 게다가 목적지가 어딘지도 아직 불분명한데!

segments.text: The Apollo Star we just heard about means the sun. The Ford Sextant Model T is an arcane device produced in the early 19th century. The Scientific Computing Center has one of those as a part of their collection.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 방금 들었던 아폴로 스타는 태양을 의미해. 포드 육분의 모델 T는 19세기 초에 제작된 마도술 장치야. 과학 컴퓨팅 센터에서 컬렉션의 일부로 하나 보유하고 있어.

segments.text: The Gorgon Current is mostly created in the Aegean Sea, near the Balkan Peninsula. I remembered an arcanum magazine in the 1970s had a detailed article about this and introduced the circulating current. I read it in the periodical room in SPDM.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 고르곤 해류는 주로 발칸 반도 근처 에게해에서 형성돼. 1970년대 마도술 잡지에서 이에 대한 자세한 기사를 본 적이 있는데, 순환 해류에 대해 소개하고 있었어. SPDM 열람실에서 읽었지.

segments.text: The current will be flowing backwards every time the Earth is at aphelion and perihelion. This is also known as the Current Reversal.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 해류는 지구가 근일점과 원일점에 있을 때 역행하게 돼. 이걸 역류라고도 하지.

segments.text: Which is on the third day of January and July this year.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 올해는 1월 3일과 7월 3일에 일어나는데...

segments.text: And the time in the outside world is ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그리고 외부 세계 시각은...

segments.text: January 1st, 1914.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 1914년 1월 1일이야.

segments.text: Are you saying that all those broadcasts are leading us to an actual place?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 그러니까 그 방송들이 실제로 존재하는 장소로 우리를 이끌고 있다는 거야?

segments.text: Ah, why? I thought we'd have a nice break after this!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 아아, 왜 그래? 이번 일 끝나면 푹 쉴 수 있을 줄 알았는데!

segments.text: Regulus, you've been longing for a ship, haven't you?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 레굴루스, 계속 배 타령하지 않았어?

segments.text: What if I tell you that I have got you one?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 만약에 내가 배를 한 척 구했다고 하면 어떻게 할래...?

segments.text: Now, hold on a second.
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 잠깐, 잠시만.

segments.text: Come to think of it, it wasn't the flower-headed radio thingy who tricked me into the Aegean Sea. It was ... Vertin?!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 그러고 보니... 날 속여서 에게해로 끌고 온 건, 머리에 꽃 단 저 라디오가 아니라... 버틴이었네?!

segments.text: Watch out, the big waves!!!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 조심해요, 큰 파도가!!!

segments.text: F
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 젠장

segments.text: Wait! Lilya, are you sure about taking off in such stormy weather?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 잠깐요! 릴리아, 이런 폭풍우 속에서 출발하는 게 확실해요?

segments.text: This isn't a normal storm. Something is attacking us from the ocean!
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 이건 평범한 폭풍우가 아니야. 바다에서 뭔가가 우리를 공격하고 있어!

segments.text: I need to pull it out! You guys go study that whatever instruction right now!
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 뽑아내야 해! 너희들은 지금 당장 그 뭐시기 설명서 연구하러 가!

segments.text: The red 38 rocket takes off and speeds across the sky like a shooting star.
segments.translation: 빨간 38호 로켓이 발사되어 유성처럼 하늘을 가로질러 빠르게 날아간다.

segments.text: Haha, I finally got you, d
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 하하, 드디어 잡았다!

segments.text: It's my turn!
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 내 차례야!

segments.text: Ed è subito sera!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: Ed è subito sera—!

segments.text: A glow cuts through the air. The mainsail halyard breaks in a snap.
segments.translation: 빛이 공기를 가르며 번쩍인다. 메인세일 할야드가 순식간에 끊어져 버렸다.

segments.text: Well done, Sonetto! Now cut the other halyard! We need to reduce the angle of attack and depower the ship!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 잘했어, 소네트! 이제 다른 쪽 돛줄을 끊어! 배의 각도를 줄이고 힘을 빼야 해!

segments.text: Roger that!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 알겠습니다!

segments.text: But we can't stay like this for long. Vertin! Have you thought of anything?!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 하지만 이걸로도 별로 시간을 끌지 못할 텐데... 버틴! 아직도 방법을 못 찾은 거야?!

segments.text: It's not working. I've tried different ways, but the tempest blocked every signal I sent for help.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 안 돼. 여러 방법을 시도해 봤지만 폭풍우가 구조 요청 신호를 모두 차단했어.

segments.text: So is that it?! We are as good as dead?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 뭐라고?! 설마 여기서 이대로 죽는 거야...?

segments.text: Wait, there might be another way.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 잠깐, 방법이 하나 더 있을지도 몰라.

segments.text: I'm sorry, Ms. Radio. I need to borrow you for a second.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 미안, 미스 라디오. 너 좀 잠깐만 빌릴게.

segments.text: Huh?
segments.speaker: Ms. Radio
segments.translation: 어?

segments.text: The radio whimpers helplessly, but that voice is soon drowned in the fierce storm.
segments.translation: 라디오가 무력하게 흐느꼈지만 그 소리는 곧 거센 폭풍우에 묻히고 말았다.

segments.text: Field Mission Evacuation Instructions, Article 21 ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 현장 임무 철수 지침, 제21조...

segments.text: There is another way, just ahead.
segments.translation: 다른 방법이 있었다. 바로 눈앞에.

segments.text: "Whenever there is an emergency, the field officer may send an SOS code with their wands through any transmission device with round buttons on it."
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 비상사태에는 현장 요원이 원형 버튼이 있는 전송 장치를 통해 완드로 구조 요청 암호를 보낼 수 있다.

segments.text: "Any Foundation member nearby will provide immediate humanitarian aid."
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 구조 요청을 보내는 즉시 주변에 있는 재단 구성원은 인도주의적 지원을 제공한다.

segments.text: "To send the code, please turn the knob one time to the right, half to the left, and then one time to the right."
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 암호키를 보내려면 다이얼을 시계 방향으로 한 바퀴, 시계 반대 방향으로 반 바퀴, 그리고 다시 시계 방향으로 한 바퀴 돌려.

segments.text: If you succeed, you shall hear ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 성공하면 다음과 같은 소리가 들릴 거야...

segments.text: "Click."
The knob is turned fully to its end point.
segments.translation: 손잡이가 끝까지 완전히 돌려졌다.

segments.text: May the peace be with you.
segments.speaker: Radio
segments.translation: 평화가 함께하기를.

segments.text: I've never seen such a tremendous ritual.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 이 정도 규모의 의식은... 처음 봐요.

segments.text: When the light of the ritual fades, three people dressed in white show up on the deck.
segments.translation: 의식의 빛이 사라지자 하얀 옷을 입은 세 사람이 갑판 위에 나타났다.

segments.text: They are wearing uniforms that look completely different from those of the usual investigators or Foundation staff.
segments.translation: 그들이 입고 있는 제복은 평소 조사원이나 재단 직원들의 것과는 완전히 달라 보였다.

segments.text: We are the special mission squad—Razor. Please show me your ID.
segments.speaker: "Razor" Captain
segments.translation: 우리는 특수임무부대 레이저다. 신분증을 보여줘.

segments.text: Thank you so much! We are ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 정말 감사합니다! 우리는...

segments.text: Oh, we know you, Timekeeper.
segments.speaker: "Razor" Captain
segments.translation: 오, 우리는 당신을 알고 있어요, 타임키퍼.

segments.text: Even in our special operation squad, you have quite a name.
segments.speaker: "Razor" Captain
segments.translation: 우리 특수작전대에서도 당신은 꽤 유명하군요.

segments.text: It seems you are in big trouble, huh?
segments.speaker: "Razor" Captain
segments.translation: 꽤 곤란한 상황에 빠진 것 같은데?

segments.text: We were under attack by a giant sea monster when sailing in the Gorgon Current. Please help us ashore safely!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 고르곤 해류를 항해하던 중 거대한 바다 괴물의 공격을 받았어요. 안전하게 육지로 올라갈 수 있게 도와주세요!

segments.text: Haha! Right down to business. Good, good! I like a straightforward person.
segments.speaker: "Razor" Captain
segments.translation: 하하! 바로 본론으로 들어가는군. 좋아, 좋아! 나는 직설적인 사람이 마음에 들어.

segments.text: Alright, William, Todd, better get a move on!
segments.speaker: "Razor" Captain
segments.translation: 좋아, 윌리엄, 토드, 서둘러!

segments.text: The arcane blades are incredibly sharp.
segments.translation: 마도학 칼날은 믿을 수 없을 정도로 예리했다.

segments.text: The razors pierce the monster's scales. Several snake heads are cut off and fall into the sea.
segments.translation: 면도날이 괴물의 비늘을 뚫고 들어간다. 여러 개의 뱀 머리가 잘려 나가 바다로 떨어진다.

segments.text: Incredible. Is that a full-size Gorgon? I've only read about this ancient sea monster in literatures.
segments.speaker: "Razor" Captain
segments.translation: 놀랍군. 저게 실물 크기 고르곤인가? 이런 고대 바다 괴물은 문헌에서만 읽어봤는데.

segments.text: Watch out! Its eyes will turn you into stone!
segments.speaker: "Razor" Captain
segments.translation: 조심해! 그놈의 눈을 보면 돌로 변해버린다고!

segments.text: There has been no witness report of a Gorgon since the 12th century. I thought the current was simply named after the mythology.
segments.speaker: "Razor" soldier
segments.translation: 12세기 이후로 고르곤의 목격담은 전혀 보고된 바가 없습니다. 저는 현재의 명칭이 단순히 신화에서 따온 것이라고 생각했습니다.

segments.text: Well, it's my privilege to have the chance to fight against it, huh?
segments.speaker: "Razor" Captain
segments.translation: 뭐, 그놈과 싸울 기회를 얻은 게 영광이긴 하지, 그치?

segments.text: William, Todd! Let's see who gets it down first!
segments.speaker: "Razor" Captain
segments.translation: 윌리엄, 토드! 누가 먼저 쓰러뜨리나 보자고!

segments.text: "Entities should not be multiplied unnecessarily."
segments.speaker: "Razor" soldier
segments.translation: 개체는 불필요하게 늘려서는 안 된다.

segments.text: Captain, I hope you still remember our founding motto.
segments.speaker: "Razor" soldier
segments.translation: 대장님, 우리의 창립 정신을 아직 기억하고 계시길 바랍니다.

segments.text: A broom passes by the ship swiftly. A playful, interested smile comes to Lilya's face.
segments.translation: 상공의 빗자루가 빠른 속도로 배를 스쳐 지나가더니, 릴리아가 흥미진진한 듯 미소를 지었다.

segments.text: Want to compete with me in speed? Heh, have a try, if you dare.
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 나랑 속도 경쟁이라도 해볼 거야? 후, 용기가 있다면 한번 해봐.

segments.text: Ho-ho! You have guts, and I appreciate it. Bring it on!
segments.speaker: "Razor" Captain
segments.translation: 호호! 배짱이 있군, 마음에 든다. 덤벼라!

segments.text: Speed up, my friends! We need to rush back to the Balkan Peninsula for another mission!
segments.speaker: "Razor" Captain
segments.translation: 속도를 올려, 친구들! 발칸 반도로 급히 돌아가야 해, 또 다른 임무가 있거든!

segments.text: Everyone, please wait a minute!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 여러분, 잠시만요!

segments.text: The size of the sea monster ... It's shrinking!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 바다 괴물의 크기가... 줄어들고 있어요!

segments.text: Errrr, what's happening now? It's gone out of sight. I have a bad feeling about this.
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 어어어, 지금 뭔 일이야? 시야에서 사라졌어. 뭔가 불길한 예감이 든다고.

segments.text: Not good! It's crawling into the cabin!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 안 돼! 선실 안으로 기어들어가고 있어!

segments.text: It plans to tear the ship apart from the inside! Everyone, watch ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 이 배를 완전히 박살 낼 생각이야... 다들 조심...

segments.text: Timekeeper!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 타임키퍼!

segments.text: Before passing out, the only thing we can hear ...
segments.translation: 의식을 잃기 전, 우리가 들을 수 있는 것은...

segments.text: is the screaming ...
segments.translation: 누군가의 외침...

segments.text: and the hands reaching out.
segments.translation: 그리고 뻗어 오는 손이었다.

segments.text: What ... is this place?
segments.translation: 여긴... 어디지?

segments.text: Blue sky, white clouds, and the beach ... a strange island.
segments.translation: 파란 하늘, 하얀 구름, 백사장... 처음 보는 섬이다.

segments.text: The waves are gently washing over the body.
segments.translation: 파도가 몸을 부드럽게 씻어내고 있었다.

segments.text: And someone is staring at us.
segments.translation: 그리고 누군가 이쪽을 빤히 쳐다보고 있다.

segments.text: Your watch was wrong.
segments.translation: 너 시계 안 맞아.

segments.text: Pardon me?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 죄송한데요?

segments.text: She repeats, as if this is the only thing worth saying.
segments.translation: 할 말이 그것밖에 없는 듯, 그녀가 다시 반복해서 말했다.

segments.text: Are you talking about my pocket watch?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 내 회중시계 얘기하는 거야?

segments.text: The numbers are now entirely different from the previous display.
segments.translation: 숫자들이 이전 화면과는 완전히 달라져 있었다.

segments.text: Your watch was losing time, so I fixed it for you.
segments.translation: 너 시계 안 맞아. 그래서 내가 다시 맞춰놨어.

segments.text: I, I don't understand.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 나, 나는 이해할 수 없어.

segments.text: Do you mean this is the right time?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그러니까... 이게 맞는 시간이라는 거야?

segments.text: Yeah.
segments.translation: 네.

segments.text: This is the year 2007, is it not?
segments.translation: 올해는 2007년이잖아. 아니야?

segments.text: You are saying we are in 2007?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그러니까... 지금이 2007년이라고?

segments.text: The heart is pounding fast in the chest.
segments.translation: 심장이 빠르게 뛰었다.

segments.text: Perhaps it's the only chance.
segments.translation: 어쩌면 이번 생에 한 번뿐인 기회일지도 모른다.

segments.text: She nods her head.
segments.translation: 그녀가 고개를 끄덕였다.

segments.text: Do you know the "Storm"?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: ...혹시 폭풍우가 뭔지 알아?

segments.text: Is that how you call it?
segments.translation: 너희는 그걸 그렇게 부르는 거야?

segments.text: We call it the Emanation.
segments.translation: 우리는 유출이라고 불러.

segments.text: The tide of pneuma is pouring down from above and converging. It would raise as a tsunami and break the world of Matters where darkness abounds.
segments.translation: 프뉴마의 조류가 위에서 쏟아져 내려와 한곳으로 모이고 있어요. 쓰나미처럼 솟구쳐 올라 어둠이 가득한 물질계를 부숴버릴 거예요.

segments.text: I don't understand.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 이해가 안 되는데.

segments.text: She tilts her head and seems equally confused.
segments.translation: 그녀는 고개를 갸웃거리며 마찬가지로 혼란스러워하는 듯했다.

segments.text: This shouldn't be hard for you to understand. You are also a real number.
segments.translation: 이해하기 어렵지 않을 거예요. 당신도 실수니까요.

segments.text: I am 37. What's your number?
segments.translation: 나는 삼십칠이야. 네 숫자는 뭐야?

segments.text: I'm Vertin.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 난 버틴이라고 해.

segments.text: No, no. I'm asking your number.
segments.translation: 아니, 아니. 네 숫자 말이야.

segments.text: The scripture says, only the people who are still in search of their essences would identify themselves by a combination of meaningless phonetic symbols.
segments.translation: 경전에 따르면, 아직 자신의 본질을 찾고 있는 사람들만이 의미 없는 음성 기호의 조합으로 자신을 규정한다고 해.

segments.text: Hmm, well, so you don't know your number yet, just like Sophia.
segments.translation: 음, 넌 아직 네 숫자를 모르는구나... 소피아처럼.

segments.text: None of her words make any sense.
segments.translation: 그녀의 말은 전혀 이해할 수 없었다.

segments.text: But this is not the most urgent matter one needs to worry about.
segments.translation: 하지만 지금 가장 시급하게 걱정해야 할 문제는 따로 있었다.

segments.text: Sonetto, Regulus, Lilya, Ms. Radio, and the Razor Squad ... where are they?
segments.translation: 소네트, 레굴루스, 릴리아, 미스 라디오 그리고 면도날 팀... 다들 어디로 간 거지?

segments.text: Have you seen my companions?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 혹시 내 동료 못 봤어?

segments.text: Yes!
segments.translation: 그래!

segments.text: Are you looking for the integer or the fraction? Or the irrational number? Or the imaginary number?
segments.translation: 어느 쪽을 찾고 있어? 정수? 분수? 아니면 무리수? 허수?

segments.text: What?
segments.speaker: Vertin

segments.text: Integers are the living example of virtues. Fractions can be understood through specific means. Irrational numbers are the free spirits, while imaginary numbers are the existence which doesn't belong to this dimension of the number axis.
segments.translation: 정수는 훌륭한 인품을 갖춘 살아있는 본보기야. 분수는 특정한 방법을 통해 이해할 수 있고. 무리수는 자유로운 영혼들이고, 허수는 숫자 축의 이 차원에 속하지 않는 존재지.

segments.text: Which one are you looking for?
segments.translation: 어느 쪽을 찾고 있어?

segments.text: I'll ask something else instead. What is this place?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 대신 다른 걸 물어볼게. 이곳이 어디야?

segments.text: Island.
segments.translation: 섬.

segments.text: What island?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: ...어느 섬?

segments.text: Have you seen another island?
segments.translation: 다른 섬도 있어?

segments.text: Huh! Maybe another question.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 흠! 다시 질문을 바꿔봐야겠군.

segments.text: Did a biographer named Urd visit here before, in 1999?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 1999년에 우르드라는 이름의 전기 작가가 여기 왔었어?

segments.text: That takes her a while to think about.
segments.translation: 그녀는 한참을 생각했다.

segments.text: 1999 is a lovely centered triangular number, but I believe this number has been abused in the doomsday stories. I mean, people are too invested in its meaning. In fact, 1999 is nothing special compared to 1991 and 1993 …
segments.translation: 1999는 아름다운 중심 삼각수야. 하지만 이 숫자가 종말론 이야기들에서 남용되고 있다고 생각해. 사람들이 그 의미에 너무 집착하고 있거든. 사실 1999는 1991이나 1993에 비해 특별할 게 없는데...

segments.text: However, 999 is a brilliant number! It is a Kaprekar number, a Palindromic number, and the largest three-digit natural number ...
segments.translation: 하지만 999는 멋져! 999는 카프리카 수이자 대칭수이고, 세 자리 자연수 중 가장 큰 수거든...

segments.text: Sorry to interrupt, but I only meant to ask about Urd, the biographer. She had been here on this island and written a travel note called Roaming in Apeiron.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 죄송하지만 잠깐만, 전기 작가 우르드에 대해서만 물어보려고 했어. 그녀가 이 섬에 와서 아페이론 기행이라는 여행기를 썼다고 하던데.

segments.text: Does the name or the book ring a bell?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그 이름이나 책에 대해 기억나는 거 있어?

segments.text: I am sorry.
segments.translation: 죄송합니다.

segments.text: Once again, she shakes her head.
segments.translation: 그녀는 역시나 고개를 저었다.

segments.text: I have no idea about the fragments of Matters you are talking about.
segments.translation: 네가 말하는 현상 세계의 부스러기에 관해서라면 아는 게 없어.

segments.text: Fragments of ... Matters?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 현상 세계... 의 부스러기...?

segments.text: Help! Somebody help!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 사람 살려... 나 좀 살려줘!

segments.text: A scream comes from behind.
segments.translation: 뒤에서 비명이 들려왔다.

segments.text: No, Mr. APPLe, stay with me for a little longer!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 안 돼, 미스터 APPLe, 조금만 더 버텨!

segments.text: Piss off! Shush! You wicked dolphins! Mr. APPLe is not your breakfast, nor are my records!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 저리 가! 이 망할 돌고래들아! 미스터 APPLe은 먹는 게 아니라고! 내 레코드도 마찬가지야!

segments.text: Huh, isn't that Vertin?!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: ...어라, 저기 버틴 아니야?!

segments.text: Vertin! Are you done with the standing and staring?! Come give us a hand!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 버틴! 거기서 멍청하게 보고만 있지 말고 어서 와서 도와줘!

segments.text: Phew, thank God you are here, Vertin! Mr. APPLe and I were this close to being made a Stargazy pie by these clever bastards and served to the dinner table!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 휴, 다행히 왔구나, 버틴! APPLe씨와 나는 이 교활한 놈들한테 스타게이지 파이 재료가 되어서 식탁에 올라갈 뻔했다고!

segments.text: You've also been incredibly helpful, Regulus.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 레굴루스, 너도 정말 큰 도움이 됐어.

segments.text: Is that so? Like how?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 그래? 어떻게?

segments.text: You rebuilt my confidence in communicating with people.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 인간과 소통할 수 있다는 자신감을 되찾게 해줬잖아.

segments.text: Have you seen Sonetto and the others?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 소네트랑 다른 애들 못 봤어?

segments.text: No. I woke up on a dolphin's back.
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 아니야. 깨어나 보니까 돌고래 등에 올라타 있더라고.

segments.text: Thought they had saved my life at first, I was quite grateful to them. But the next moment, they just started all the beating and biting!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 처음엔 내 목숨을 구해준 줄 알고 꽤 고마워했다고! 그런데 그 다음 순간부터 때리고 물어뜯기 시작하는 거야!

segments.text: They think you are an irrational number. That's why they bit you!
segments.translation: 네가 무리수라고 생각해서 문 거야...!

segments.text: Whoa, this little lady made me jump! Vertin, who is this long-haired stranger?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 어머, 이 아가씨가 날 깜짝 놀라게 했네! 버틴, 이 긴 머리 낯선 사람은 누구야?

segments.text: A familiar voice calls from the distance.
segments.translation: 멀리서 익숙한 목소리가 들려온다.

segments.text: Timekeeper!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 타임키퍼!

segments.text: Thank goodness. You are all safe and sound!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 정말 다행이에요. 다들 무사했군요!

segments.text: Lilya is on her way. Now we only need to find the captain and his team members ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 릴리아 씨가 오고 있어요. 이제 캡틴과 팀원들만 찾으면 되겠네요...

segments.text: Next to her stand several strangers in white garments.
segments.translation: 그녀의 옆에는 흰 옷을 입은 낯선 이들이 서 있었다.

segments.text: Sonetto, these people are ...?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 소네트, 이 사람들은...?

segments.text: They are the Apeiron believers. They lent us a helping hand after the ship went down.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 아페이론 신도들이에요. 배가 침몰한 후 우리를 도와준 사람들이죠.

segments.text: The robed figures stand unspeaking and motionless.
segments.translation: 로브를 입은 인물들이 말없이 움직이지 않고 서 있었다.

segments.text: Until one steps forward to break the silence.
segments.translation: 그때 한 사람이 앞으로 나서며 침묵을 깨뜨렸다.

segments.text: Not at all. An integer is under an obligation to help his kind.
segments.translation: 아닙니다. 정수끼리 마땅히 도와야죠.

segments.text: Ms. Sonetto, have you found your friends?
segments.translation: 소네트 씨, 동료분들은 다 찾으셨습니까?

segments.text: Yes, only the members of the Razor Squad are still missing. They also belong to the St. Pavlov Foundation, like we do.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 네, 레이저 스쿼드 멤버들만 아직 실종 상태예요. 그들도 저희처럼 성 파블로프 재단 소속이거든요.

segments.text: Imaginary numbers are not of our concern.
segments.translation: 허수는 고려 대상이 아닙니다.

segments.text: Imaginary numbers?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 허수요?

segments.text: You should not linger here if you've already found your lost friends. We will provide a boat for you to leave.
segments.translation: 흩어진 동료를 다 찾은 거라면 더는 여기 머무를 수 없습니다. 떠날 수 있도록 배를 준비해 드리죠.

segments.text: Our school of thought does not accommodate uninvited guests.
segments.translation: 학파는 초대하지 않은 손님을 받지 않습니다.

segments.text: Wait, we have something to ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 잠시만요, 저희가 아직...

segments.text: What if we know about the Emanation?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: ...우리가 유출에 대해 알고 있다면요?

segments.text: The man halts.
segments.translation: 남자가 걸음을 멈춘다.

segments.text: We are the investigators from St. Pavlov Foundation. We are glad to share the information about the "Storm" or the Emanation.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 저희는 성 파블로프 재단 소속 조사원입니다. 폭풍우나 에마네이션에 관한 정보를 기꺼이 공유해 드리겠습니다.

segments.text: Please grant us entry to this island so that we can share them.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 섬에 들어가 이야기를 나눌 수 있게 허락해 주시죠.

segments.text: Timekeeper?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 타임키퍼?

segments.text: I'll explain to you later. Trust me, please, Sonetto.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: ...나중에 설명해 줄게. 날 믿어, 소네트.

segments.text: The white robes whisper to each other.
segments.translation: 흰 옷을 입은 사람들이 서로 속삭인다.

segments.text: Come this way. We will talk.
segments.translation: 이쪽으로 오세요. 이야기를 나누죠.

segments.text: However, only integers and fractions are welcomed here.
segments.translation: 하지만 여기서는 정수와 분수만 환영받습니다.

segments.text: The man puts out a finger, directly pointing at Regulus.
segments.translation: 남자가 손가락을 내밀어 레굴루스를 똑바로 가리켰다.

segments.text: No irrational number is allowed on this island.
segments.translation: 무리수는 이 섬에 들어올 수 없습니다.

segments.text: Throw her into the sea!
segments.translation: 저자를 바다에 던져라!

segments.text: Huh?
segments.speaker: Regulus

segments.text: Wait, now hold on a second! I said hol- …
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 잠깐, 잠깐만! 내가 잠깐이라고... ...

segments.text: Yes, all is well.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 네, 저희는 무사해요.

segments.text: Those dolphins sent us to the other side of the currents.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 그 돌고래들이 저희를 해류 반대편으로 데려왔어요.

segments.text: And one more thing, captain, and I'm asking this with no ill intention. Errrr, may I know your lineage?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 참, 나쁜 뜻으로 여쭤보는 건 절대 아닙니다만... 실례지만 선장님은 종족 혈통이 어떻게 되시나요...?

segments.text: The blue flower gently conveys the answer back to her.
segments.translation: 푸른 꽃이 질문의 답을 조용히 전했다.

segments.text: Thank you. I wish your next mission would be trouble-free, too.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 감사합니다. 팀장님도 순조롭게 임무 마치시길 바랄게요.

segments.text: Sonetto sighs softly in relief and turns the knob back to the original position.
segments.translation: 소네트가 안도의 한숨을 살며시 내쉬며 손잡이를 원래 위치로 돌렸다.

segments.text: The members of the Razor Squad are all humans.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 면도날 팀원은 모두 인간이라고 하네요.

segments.text: It's clear then.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그럼 아주 명백하네.

segments.text: "Real numbers" refer to arcanists, and "imaginary numbers" mean humans.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 실수는 마도학자, 허수는 인간을 뜻해.

segments.text: Then what is the rest of this nonsense?
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 그럼 나머지 헛소리는 뭐야?

segments.text: Sonetto, Vertin, and this APPLe are "integers."
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 소네트 씨, 버틴 씨, 저 APPLe은 정수입니다.

segments.text: While Ms. Lilya and I are "fractions."
segments.speaker: Ms. Radio
segments.translation: 릴리야 씨와 저는 파편이지만 말이야.

segments.text: Don't bother asking, I am pureblood.
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 굳이 묻지 마, 난 순혈이야.

segments.text: This APPLe is also made of pure apple juice.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 저 APPLe도 순도 100% 사과 과즙입니다.

segments.text: I only consume 1.5V DC.
segments.speaker: Ms. Radio
segments.translation: 전 1.5V DC만 소모해요.

segments.text: So it's not determined by our lineage, or Regulus would have been an integer, too.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그럼 혈통으로 결정되는 건 아니네. 그랬다면 레굴루스도 정수였을 테니까.

segments.text: So why on earth am I the irrational number?! Why only me?!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 그러니까 난 왜 무리수냐고오! 왜 나만!!!

segments.text: Unfair! I demand the ruling be changed!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 불공평해! 심판 양반, 재고 요청합니다!

segments.text: Shut up. We grappled hard to get you on this island.
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 닥쳐. 너를 이 섬에 데려오려고 얼마나 고생했는데.

segments.text: So you have no choice but to stay in the worst guest room.
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 그래서 너는 가장 형편없는 객실에 머물 수밖에 없어.

segments.text: You call this a guest room? A cell, more like!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 이게 객실이라고? 감옥이나 다름없잖아!

segments.text: The cell is left unlocked—so clearly some vestige of human rights and dignity remains on the island.
segments.translation: 감옥 문이 잠겨 있지 않은 걸 보니, 이 섬에도 인권과 존엄성의 흔적이 남아 있는 것 같았다.

segments.text: Regulus shakes the railing as fiercely as if England had just lost the World Cup.
segments.translation: 잉글랜드가 방금 월드컵에서 탈락한 것처럼, 분노한 레굴루스가 창살을 마구 흔들었다.

segments.text: Perhaps this piece of news will cheer you up.
segments.speaker: Ms. Radio
segments.translation: 아마 이 소식이 당신의 기분을 좋게 해줄 거예요.

segments.text: "We are prisoners in the world, and our body is the cage of the soul ..."
segments.speaker: Ms. Radio
segments.translation: 우리는 세상의 죄수이고, 우리의 몸은 영혼의 감옥이야...

segments.text: Cut me a break. Might as well play us some rock music.
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 좀 봐줘. 차라리 로큰롤이라도 틀어주지 그래.

segments.text: Her chief mate appears calmer than the captain still wrestling with her fate as much as the railing.
segments.translation: 일등 항해사는 난간을 붙잡고 자신의 운명과 씨름하고 있는 선장보다 훨씬 침착해 보였다.

segments.text: Hmm, seems the residents on this island venerate integer numbers.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 음... 아무래도 이 섬은 정수를 떠받드는 것 같습니다.

segments.text: And irrational numbers, or non-terminating, non-repeating decimals, cannot be represented as the ratio of two integers; hence, they are discriminated.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 그리고 무리수, 즉 무한소수이면서 순환하지 않는 소수는 두 정수의 비로 나타낼 수 없기 때문에 차별받는 거죠.

segments.text: No, no, no. Who are they to judge and decide me to be the irrational number?!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 아니, 아니야! 누가 나를 무리수라고 판단하고 결정할 권리가 있다는 거야?!

segments.text: I, I was the only person who didn't cause any damage to the Foundation in the previous protest!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 나, 나는 이전 시위에서 재단에 피해를 전혀 입히지 않은 유일한 사람이었다고!

segments.text: Woo-ah! Why do I get to have the worst of both worlds ...
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 우와아! 왜 나만 이것도 저것도 다 최악이야...

segments.text: I've requested information from Ms. Moissan about Apeiron. But it will take some time for the files to come in.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 무아상 씨에게 아페이론 학파의 정보를 부탁했는데, 아마 시간이 걸릴 거예요.

segments.text: The captain of the Razor special operation squad told me this might be a settlement of a group of arcanists who have been long cut off from the world.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 면도날 기동 부대 팀장님은 여기가 오랫동안 세상과 단절된 마도학자들의 집결지일 수도 있다고 하셨어요.

segments.text: Unlike other unregistered arcanists, these people chose not to live alongside the humans. They still lead an ancient arcanist way of life and follow the old customs. We must be meticulous when getting in touch with them.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 다른 미등록 마도사들과는 달리, 이들은 인간과 함께 살기를 거부했어요. 여전히 고대 마도사들의 생활 방식을 따르며 옛 관습을 지키고 있죠. 그들과 접촉할 때는 신중해야 해요.

segments.text: But they use modern mathematical terms, and that girl talked about Kaprekar—he was an Indian mathematician active in the first half of the 20th century.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 하지만 현대 수학 용어를 사용하고 있어. 그리고 그 아이가 카프레카에 대해 얘기했는데... 그는 20세기 전반에 활동한 인도 수학자야.

segments.text: I think they are not living in complete isolation. They are still in contact with the outside world.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 세상과 단절된 게 아니라, 외부 세계와 계속 연락을 취하고 있는 것 같은데.

segments.text: This place wouldn't be affected by the "Storm," just like the Olitiau base, Foundation headquarters, and my suitcase.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 이곳은 오리티우 기지나 재단 본부, 그리고 내 여행 가방처럼 폭풍우의 영향을 받지 않을 거야.

segments.text: The travel notes in 1999, Manus Vindictae showing up in Olitiau's base, the "Storm," or Emanation ... They must be somehow connected.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 1999년 기행문... 기지에 나타난 재건의 손... 폭풍우 혹은 유출... 이것들은 분명 무엇인가로 연결이 되어 있어.

segments.text: And we'll find our answer here, I think.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 여기서 답을 찾을 수 있을 것 같아.

segments.text: Very energetic, captain.
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 정말 활기차네, 캡틴.

segments.text: By the way, how come nobody is here to welcome us?
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 그런데 우리를 맞이하러 온 사람이 아무도 없네?

segments.text: They wouldn't suddenly decide to detain us all just because we have an irrational number here, right?
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 여기 무리수가 하나 있다고 해서 갑자기 우리 모두를 구금하기로 결정하지는 않겠지, 그렇지?

segments.text: I'm with you all the time.
segments.translation: 나 계속 여기 있었는데.

segments.text: A reluctant figure walks out of the shadow in the corner.
segments.translation: 벽 모퉁이에서 의욕 없어 보이는 그림자가 나타났다.

segments.text: 6 asked me to welcome you.
segments.translation: 6이 나한테 너희 응대를 맡겼어.

segments.text: Ah, scared me again. What were you doing hiding in the corner?!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 으악, 또 깜짝이야. 모퉁이에서 뭘 하고 숨어 있던 거야?!

segments.text: Because it seemed you were in the middle of proving a conjecture.
segments.translation: ...증명을 하고 있는 것 같아서.

segments.text: According to the scripture, disturbing others when they are giving proofs of their arguments is as sinful as eating beans.
segments.translation: 교리에선 논증을 하고 있는 사람을 방해하는 건 콩을 먹는 것만큼이나 죄악이라고 하던데.

segments.text: I don't want to be bound to the rocks of the Caucasus Mountain and have vultures eating my eyes after my death.
segments.translation: 죽어서 캅카스 산에 못 박힌 채 독수리에게 눈알을 파먹히고 싶진 않아.

segments.text: Eating beans?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 콩을 드시는 거예요?

segments.text: Eating beans is the sin of sins.
segments.translation: 콩을 먹는 건 그 어떤 죄악 중에서도 가장 나쁜 죄야.

segments.text: The biggest, worst, and ugliest crime. People eating beans will never transmigrate. They deserve nothing but eternal punishment.
segments.translation: 가장 심각하고... 가장 나쁜... 더러운 악행이야. 콩을 먹는 사람은 윤회에 들지 못하고 영원히 가혹한 형벌을 받아야 해.

segments.text: Whoa, are you serious? Is this rule only for soybeans? What about broad beans? Snow peas? Chickpeas?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 와, 정말이야? 이 규칙이 대두에만 해당하는 거야? 누에콩은? 완두콩은? 병아리콩은?

segments.text: And what does it say about other bean-based products?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 그럼 콩으로 만든 제품도 안 돼?

segments.text: Beans are beans.
segments.translation: 콩이면 다 똑같아.

segments.text: Haha, you're funny. This doesn't even make sense! By this logic, aren't the coffee drinkers going to rot in hell?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 하하, 웃기는 소리! 이건 말도 안 돼! 그런 논리라면 커피 마시는 사람들은 다 지옥에서 썩어야 한다는 거 아냐?

segments.text: I happen to have a box of coffee beans in my bag.
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 마침 내 가방에 커피콩이 한 상자 있는데...

segments.text: The Rockin' Pirate produces her treasure and waves a single bean around her mouth, looking for a reaction.
segments.translation: 로큰롤 해적이 보물을 꺼내더니 콩 하나를 입가에서 흔들며 반응을 살폈다.

segments.text: If I put one coffee bean in my mouth, will the vulture get me right away?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 커피콩 하나만 입에 넣어도 바로 독수리한테 끌려가는 건가?

segments.text: No way!
segments.translation: 안 돼!
